cast.name: 韦丽科·安贾帕里泽 Veriko Andjaparidze
索菲柯·齐阿乌列里 Sofiko Chiaureli

writer.name: 亚历山大·米沙林 Aleksandr Misharin

introduction: This historic drama is set in an Ossetian village in the 17th century. The film’s main hero is Chermen. An illegitimate son, Chermen is striving to assert his dignity. He is opposed by Dacco, the elder of the Aldar clan, in whose village Chermen lives. Guided by mercenary motives, Dacco strikes a deal with Prince Tsarai. Together, they rob people and then divide the loot between themselves. By some chance, Chermen learns of the deal and informs his friends about it. At first, he thinks that no one in the Aldar village would believe him, the bastard, and that the plot would remain unexposed. But the friends accept the challenge.Dedicated to the legendary hero of the Ossetian people - Chermen. Two hundred years ago he was the first to raise the poor peasants to struggle for their rights against the Aldar land owners.
